directions: Whisk first 3 ingredients in small bowl until blended. Mix in chives. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 2 hours head. Let stand at room temperature.)
Combine lettuces, cucumber, jicama, bell pepper, grapes and mushrooms in large bowl. Add dressing and toss to blend. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped fresh chives or green onions
title: Mixed Greens and Fruit with Mustard Dressing
